contentrichtext.text: '''[[Zongo]]''' is a town in [[Équateur]], [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]] '''Zongo''' is the name of several people: *[[Mamadou Zongo]], a Burkinabé football player *[[Norbert Zongo]] (1949–1998), a [[Burkina Faso|Burkinabé]] journalist *[[Ousmane Zongo]], African arts trader from [[Burkina Faso]] *[[Tertius Zongo]], a [[Burkina Faso|Burkinabé]] politician and diplomat '''Zongo''' might also be used to refer to: *''Zongo'', a character in the comic series [[Dungeon (comics)|Dungeon]] *[[Zongo Comics]], a [[comic book]] publishing company founded by [[Matt Groening]] *[[Zongo Settlements]], areas in [[West African]] towns along the coast and in the [[forest belt]] populated predominantly by settlers, often [[Islamic]], from northern [[Sahel]] areas. {{Disambig}}
